dcterms:description: Trivia Creative Writing dataset, which contains 100 samples. Each sample is required to generate a story to cover the required topic and input questions.
dcterms:title: Trivia Creative Writing

dcterms:creator: J. Xie

dcterms:description: Trip Planning dataset that comprises travel plans for 50 world-famous attractions, with specific requirements generated based on the characteristics of the destinations. It includes the following fields: destination, basic requirements, duration of travel, season, type of travelers, number of travelers, and budget.
dcterms:title: Trip Planning
